mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.nickname , u.reset_token , u.level , u.create_date , u.update_date , p.position_id , p.position_name , i.image_id , i.status , i.original_file_name , i.storage_file_name , u_s.user_skill_id , s.skill_id , s.skill_name FROM user u JOIN image i on u.image_id = u.image_id JOIN position p on p.position_id = u.position_id JOIN user_skill u_s on u_s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN skill s ON s.skill_id = u_s.skill_id WHERE u.email = #{email}

SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.nickname , u.reset_token , u.level , u.create_date , u.update_date , p.position_id , p.position_name , i.image_id , i.status , i.original_file_name , i.storage_file_name , u_s.user_skill_id , s.skill_id , s.skill_name FROM user u JOIN image i on u.image_id = u.image_id JOIN position p on p.position_id = u.position_id JOIN user_skill u_s on u_s.user_id = u.user_id JOIN skill s ON s.skill_id = u_s.skill_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
